value:
$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You again. Turn back—now.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|So, you are with the empire!
Why do you hide behind
that damnable mask?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I am not with Embla. Nor am I with
you. Still, I'll say it one last time.
Turn back—NOW.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Never. Stand aside, or we will break
through, one way or another!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|I...I can't keep fighting. You Order
of Heroes people... Don't you
realize you're on the wrong track?$k$pVeronica's imperial forces aren't
invading your capital.$k$pThey're going to your summoning
ruins—to destroy them.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|What? Why?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|She wishes to put an end to
your summoner's power.$k$pDo you understand what that would
mean—for everything? If so, you
should get to the ruins fast.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Why are you revealing her
plans to us?$k$p$WmMEID_ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Normal,Face|$w0|That is my secret to keep.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Wait! Get back here!$k$p$EFace_Pain|He's gone. Well, Alfonse? What
did you make of all that?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|I don't know for sure. But we
should head for the ruins.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|What if it's a trap?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|I have a strange feeling he wasn't
lying, at least about Veronica
wanting to destroy those ruins.$k$pWe need to put a stop to that,
$Nu!$k$Sbs150|
